# IMPORTANT: DO NOT TAKE SCREENSHOTS

This project is a browser-based game. DO NOT use playwright or any screenshot tools during development.

## For AI Agents:
- Do NOT take screenshots of the game
- Do NOT use playwright browser automation for visual testing
- Test functionality through code inspection and console output only
- Performance can be validated through FPS counters in the code

## Reason:
Screenshots are not needed for this project and slow down development.
